# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily productivity and satisfaction. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $120. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150. This is an excellent opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. I trust you will find it valuable. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
